<h3 id="X12680">X(12680)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: MANDART-INCIRCLE TO EXTOUCH</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*a^5-(b^2-6*b*c+c^2)*a^4-2*(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^3+2*(b^2+c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)^2  :  :
<br>
<b>X(12680) = 4*X(3)-3*X(210) = 2*X(4)-3*X(354) = X(8)-3*X(11220) = 2*X(10)-3*X(10167) = 2*X(40)-3*X(5918) = 3*X(65)-4*X(5884) = 3*X(354)-4*X(12675) = 4*X(355)-5*X(3698) = 2*X(960)-3*X(5731) = 3*X(5731)-X(12528)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(40).</p>
<p>X(12680) lies on these lines: {1,971}, {3,210}, {4,354}, {8,9859}, {9,8273}, {10,10167}, {11,6260}, {12,6245}, {20,518}, {33,12136}, {40,5918}, {48,1903}, {55,84}, {56,1490}, {65,515}, {72,2801}, {145,9961}, {185,8679}, {198,963}, {200,9841}, {227,7004}, {355,3698}, {388,9799}, {516,3555}, {517,1657}, {912,3962}, {942,4355}, {944,3057}, {952,3893}, {956,12520}, {958,5784}, {960,5731}, {1040,9370}, {1056,12710}, {1125,5927}, {1155,11500}, {1208,2183}, {1319,1898}, {1385,5259}, {1478,5787}, {1479,6259}, {1697,7992}, {1698,5789}, {1699,5045}, {1709,3295}, {1750,3333}, {1768,3579}, {1837,5768}, {2098,7971}, {2099,12650}, {2310,4322}, {2646,12114}, {2829,12743}, {2951,8001}, {3059,5584}, {3086,5658}, {3091,3742}, {3146,3873}, {3243,12651}, {3303,12705}, {3486,9960}, {3522,3681}, {3523,3740}, {3576,5777}, {3600,10394}, {3624,10157}, {3683,7330}, {3689,5534}, {3697,10164}, {3748,11496}, {3848,5056}, {3889,9812}, {3983,6684}, {4298,5728}, {4430,5059}, {4662,10178}, {4679,5811}, {5044,7987}, {5049,11522}, {5173,9579}, {5290,11018}, {5302,6986}, {5432,6705}, {5572,11037}, {5587,9940}, {5882,5919}, {5889,9037}, {6257,10928}, {6258,10927}, {6744,10569}, {6762,12565}, {6765,10860}, {8580,9858}, {9844,11019}, {9910,10833}, {10106,12711}, {10443,10823}, {10480,12547}, {10544,12721}, {10799,12196}, {10877,12496}, {10947,12676}, {10953,12677}, {10965,12686}, {10966,12687}, {11873,12456}, {11874,12457}, {11909,12668}</p>
<p>
X(12680) = midpoint of X(145) and X(9961)<br>
X(12680) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (4,12675), (8,9943), (72,4297), (3057,944), (3059,5732), (5691,942), (6253,4292), (7957,20), (9848,9845), (12528,960), (12664,12114), (12667,9942), (12672,5882), (12688,1)<br>
X(12680) = X(84)-of-Mandart-incircle-triangle<br>
X(12680) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4,12675,354), (8,11220,9943), (944,12246,4294), (3295,12684,1709), (5534,7171,10310), (5534,10310,3689), (5731,12528,960), (5882,12672,5919), (9947,11227,1698)<br>
</p>
